titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the University of Michigan Seventy-fifth Anniversary Celebrations

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: University of Michigan Seventy-fifth Anniversary Celebrations

archdesc.scopecontent: Registration book, June 1912, of delegates and guests to the 75th anniversary celebration of the founding of the University of Michigan; also guest books.
